text: Speaking to the press after day 1 of the European Council. https://t.co/n1PgdhZBWz #EUCO #migrationEU #UKinEU https://t.co/2493rNwueE
Our discussion in this critical moment of the #migration crisis has only reinforced our commitment to building a European consensus.
On migration, there is no good alternative to a comprehensive European plan. We must look for a synthesis of different approaches.
A European solution on migration is about decisions taken in capitals but we must improve the co-ordination of those decisions.
We need to get back to a situation where all Members of the #Schengen area fully apply the Schengen Borders Code.

It began hj, throughout the country, the Mobilization of Education # ZikaZero, to expand the fight against mosquito q transmits dengue, zika and chikungunya.
We will be in schools all over the country, me, ministers, governors, mayors, secretaries of education and teachers (...)
(...) to raise awareness and explain how to eliminate breeding sites of the Aedes mosquito. #ZikaZero
I started in Petrolina / PE, delivering 4,904 dwellings of #MinhaCasaMinhaVida, in event q happened simultaneously in + 6 cities. #ZikaZero
They are deliveries in Belo Horizonte, Franca / SP, São José dos Campos / SP, Mogi das Cruzes / SP, Cachoeiro do Itapemirim / ES and Canoas / RS.
Now I'm going to Juazeiro / BA. I will visit a plant that develops Aedes transgenic, sterilizing the mosquito and preventing the development of larvae.
+ afternoon I will teach at Col. Alfredo Vianna to explain to the students and prof. as it is simple to avoid the mosquito's birth, in homes and schools
The classrooms of Brazil reach 60 million people, among students, prof. and employees at all levels. #ZikaZero
If everyone mobilizes, we will win this war. Talk to colleagues, friends and family. Do your part! #ZikaZero

And then it is also 100 per cent. formally adopted! #EUCO #dkpol
Speaking to press after day 2 of the European Council. Watch it live: https://t.co/XGjWTOapvE. #EUCO #UKinEU https://t.co/DrXob5SNMD
We have achieved a legally binding and irreversible deal decided on by all 28 leaders, strengthening Britain's special status in the EU.
The #UKinEU settlement addresses all of PM @David_Cameron 's concerns without compromising our fundamental values.
We didn't walk away from the negotiating table. We were willing to sacrifice part of our interests for the common good, to show our unity.
I deeply believe the UK needs Europe and Europe needs the UK. But the final decision is in the hands of the British people.
I believe Britain is stronger, safer and better off within a reformed European Union. My statement on tonight's deal https://t.co/7XCOHfQFTR
A day like yesterday, 6 years ago, Father RENATO POBLETE died. He lived for the most needy and was an inspiration to all who met him
Agreement on package with UK is good news for all 28 member states. Strengthens Europe & it contains agreements that NL has advocated for a long time.
Most importantly, the EU focuses on competitiveness and strengthening the internal market. NL wants to further implement the growth agenda during # EU2016NL.
Those who want to remember can visit the RENATO POBLETE Park, on the banks of the Mapocho and relive its wonderful testimonies and teachings
During #EUCO also talked about approach to migratory flow. We are working on all necessary solutions to curb flow of illegal migration.
